page.title: 19Shopping Survey - Findings
page.content: 59 householders provided the following information:- All but 5 shopped in Hereford at least occasionally; 12 never shopped in Monmouth; 13 never shopped in Ross; 46 never shopped in Abergavenny. For shopping at least monthly, Hereford was the most popular town (34), followed by Monmouth (25) and Ross (20). For shopping at least weekly:- Hereford (17), Monmouth (16), Ross (14). Only 4 people mentioned daily shopping. Most commonly people went to Hereford, Monmouth or Ross weekly or fortnightly, and elsewhere monthly or just occasionally. Of the other towns, Gloucester received 4 mentions, and Bristol 3. There are clear connections with occupations: those who work in Hereford or Ross tend to shop there.
